about_the_game:
Memoria

Latin - Memoria

Memory is the faculty of the brain by which data or information is encoded, stored, and retrieved when needed. It is the retention of information over time for the purpose of influencing future action.

ABOUT

MEMORIA combines elements from interactive fictions of the 90s and from graphic adventure games. Through all the choices that you will meet during the story, you will decide the fate of Adam.

STORY

You woke up from cryogenic sleep while your crew is still sleeping.
You don't remember who you are and why you woke up so early.
Your spaceship is stuck in deep space and the systems are inactive.
You need help.
Will you be able to survive and discover the truth?
